column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Haru says : " Hi , Katara . "
#Text=Katara says : " Haru !
#Text=When we met him , his town was controlled by the Fire Nation .
#Text=So he had to hide his earthbending .
#Text=" Haru says : " Katara inspired me and my father to take back our village .
#Text=" Tyro says : " You helped us find our courage , Katara .
#Text=Now we 're here to help you .
#Text=" Toph says : " No way !
#Text=Is that - " Big Bad Hippo says : " Hippo happy to see Blind Bandit !
#Text=" Toph says : " You guys here for a rematch ?
#Text=" The Boulder says : " Negatory .
#Text=The Boulder and The Hippo no longer fight for others ' entertainment .
#Text=Now , we fight for our kingdom !
#Text=" Toph says : " Sweet .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Was that a new invention ?
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Yes , but unfortunately the incendiary capabilities of peanut sauce prove to be a failure .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're making peanut sauce bombs ?
#Text=" Pipsqueak says : " They 're destructive .
#Text=" The Duke says : " And delicious .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Where you able to complete work on the plans I send you ?
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Yes , I was , and I think the Fire Nation will be quite surprised .
#Text=" Teo says : " Aang , my dad and I made this for you .
#Text=" Aang says : " A new glider !
#Text=This is amazing !
#Text=" Mechanist says : " And as a special feature , I added the snack compartment .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh ... well , I 'm sure that will come in handy .
#Text="
